data.text: @wizard7575 @nzherald Do you have a link to this Pfizer information?

@CivilSocietyNZ @nzherald Millions and millions, more each day. The side effects can happen months or even years later, Pfizer released their list of side effects today and it’s 10 pages long. Those with the shot are truly playing games with their lives :(
@solon_of @nzherald As long as it's not cannabis , we'll be right 👊🙏

@nzherald This ‘expert’ is now pinning every known vaccine side-effect onto long-COVID19! Conveniently ignoring all research that has been published over the last 18 months on this subject. That article will come back to bite him in the future! https://t.co/scUZj6wBj3
@toastfloats @AAragurn @nzherald Seu caso foi de total descaso médico! Erro médico pq se vc tivesse sido tratada logo no início, não teria tido a necessidade de colocar marca passo.

@nzherald Essas pessoas que tiveram Omicron não estavam vacinadas? Se sim, com que vacinas? Por que eu pergunto? Pq esses sintomas de AVC e infarte estão extensamente ligados a determinadas vacinas! Pessoas que tiveram Covid e não vacinaram não tem nenhum problema adicional
@nzherald Amazing how all these heart condition and ailments realted to the heart appear after the jab.
